Message:
Slowly but surely,
I started getting fans!

I remember the time
I performed in a small village...

There was this young girl who,
while hugging a gunslinger doll,
called out to me.

“The world’s greatest gunslinger!”
she said. I was so happy...

But when the witches’ Curse started
spreading throughout the continent,

people would turn us down, saying they
“weren’t in the mood for the circus.”

They drove us out... They cursed at us...
Honestly, it was pretty painful.

But you know...
what hurt more than
all of that put together...

was the fact that I couldn’t
put smiles on their gloomy faces.
